name: AlphaArc
description: AlphaArc - Real-Time Blockchain Intelligence for Smarter AI AlphaArc transforms AI agents into Web3 powerhouses, empowering them to autonomously detect on-chain patterns and anomalies. Unlock possibilities, including: • Trading & Market Making: Execute trades, identify arbitrage, and earn fees. • Scam Detection: Spot fraud, rug pulls, and suspicious wallet activity. • Protocol Analytics: Discover hot DeFi projects and monitor TVL trends. • Portfolio Optimization: Optimize strategies for staking, holding, and reallocation. • NFT Intelligence: Track trending collections and influential traders.
